name: Xueling Zhang
content: Xueling Zhang's websiteXueling ZhangAssistant ProfessorDepartment of Software Engineering Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences Rochester Institute of Technology Office Location: GOL 1527 xueling.zhang@rit.eduHomePublicationsTeachingStudentsServices I am an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering at the Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT). I am broadly interested in software engineering, software security, and privacy. My work aims to build testing and analysis techniques for improving the quality, reliability, and trustworthiness of software applications. I earned my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from University of Texas at San Antonio in 2021. I am looking for PhD students interested in software engineeing/securiy/privacy. If you are interested, please reach out to me via email:xueling.zhang@rit.eduUpdates01/2025: Many thanks to NSF for supporting our research on Automated Testing of Augmented Reality Apps!! 06/2024: One paper accepted to ISSTA. 04/2024: I am honored to have received an NSF CRII Award.09/2022: One paper accepted to TOSEM.08/2022: Two papers accepted to ASE 2022.
